quote: Each path to knowledge involves different rules and these rules are not interchangeable. – Barack Obama
fact: Jim Henson first coined the word “Muppet”. It is a combination of “marionette” and “puppet.”
joke: What do you call a monkey in a mine field? A babooooom!
